recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese, black pepper
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, curry powder, coconut milk
recipes.instructions: 1. Fry onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and curry powder. 3. Add tomatoes and coconut milk. 4. Simmer until cooked.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, baking powder, milk
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Add wet ingredients. 3. Bake in the oven.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop lettuce. 2. Add croutons and cheese. 3. Toss with dressing.
